trans-unit.source: Provides a buffer that allows a fallback handler to return an alternate string to an encoder when it cannot encode an input character.
trans-unit.target: 提供緩衝區，允許後援處理常式在無法編碼輸入字元時，將替代字串傳回至編碼器。

trans-unit.source: An encoding defines a mapping between a Unicode character and an encoded sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 編碼方式定義的 Unicode 字元編碼的位元組序列之間的對應。

trans-unit.source: An encoding operation, which converts an input character to an output byte sequence, fails if no mapping is defined for a particular character.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義對應特定字元，編碼作業，它會將輸入的字元轉換成輸出位元組序列，將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides a failure handling mechanism, called a fallback, if a conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供失敗處理機制，稱為後援，如果無法執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: All encoder fallback handlers must implement the following:
trans-unit.target: 所有的編碼器後援處理常式必須實作下列各項：

trans-unit.source: An encoder fallback, which is represented by a class derived from the <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallback> class.
trans-unit.target: 編碼器後援，表示由類別衍生自<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallback>類別。

trans-unit.source: An encoder fallback buffer, which is represented by a type derived from the <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer> class that can return a string to the conversion operation.
trans-unit.target: 編碼器後援緩衝區，衍生的類型由<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer>類別可以傳回字串的轉換作業。

trans-unit.source: Fallbacks can use three strategies to handle conversion failures:
trans-unit.target: 後援可以使用三種策略來處理轉換失敗：

trans-unit.source: Best-fit mapping.
trans-unit.target: 自動調整的對應。

trans-unit.source: The encoder fallback buffer can return a string that represents a close approximation to the input character.
trans-unit.target: 編碼器後援緩衝區可以傳回字串，表示輸入字元的近似值。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not provide a public best-fit <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer> implementation.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 並未提供最適合的公用<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer>實作。

trans-unit.source: Replacement.
trans-unit.target: 取代。

trans-unit.source: The encoder fallback buffer can return a string, such as a question mark ("?"), that indicates that a character could not be encoded.
trans-unit.target: 編碼器後援緩衝區可以傳回的字串，例如問號 (「？ 」)，指出無法編碼的字元。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback> and <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer> classes provide a public replacement fallback buffer implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback>和<xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallbackBuffer>類別提供公用取代後援緩衝區實作。

trans-unit.source: The constructor of the <xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback> class enables you to define the replacement string.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式<xref:System.Text.EncoderReplacementFallback>類別可讓您定義的取代字串。

trans-unit.source: Exception.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer> implementation throws an exception, which indicates that a character cannot be encoded, and terminates the encoding operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer>實作會擲回的例外狀況，指出無法編碼字元，並終止編碼作業。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the fallback handler must provide an <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer> implementation, although it does not return a string to the encoder.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，後援處理常式必須提供<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer>實作中，雖然它不會傳回至編碼器的字串。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Text.EncoderExceptionFallback> and <xref:System.Text.EncoderExceptionFallbackBuffer> classes provide a public exception fallback implementation that throws an <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackException> when a character cannot be encoded.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Text.EncoderExceptionFallback>和<xref:System.Text.EncoderExceptionFallbackBuffer>類別提供的公用例外狀況後援實作會擲回<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackException>無法編碼字元時。

trans-unit.source: The buffer in an <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer> implementation represents the entire string to be returned to the encoder in response to an encoder fallback.
trans-unit.target: 在緩衝區<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer>實作代表整個字串傳回至編碼器的回應中的編碼器後援。

trans-unit.source: Generally, implementations also include state information, such as the index of the next character to return to the encoder and the number of remaining characters to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，實作也包含狀態資訊，例如若要返回的編碼器，以及剩餘的字元數傳回的下一個字元索引。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer> is an abstract class, it requires derived classes to implement the following members at a minimum:
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer>是抽象類別，它需要在衍生的類別以實作至少下列成員：

trans-unit.source: The overloaded <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> method, which is called by the encoder when it cannot encode a character.
trans-unit.target: 多載<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A>編碼器無法編碼字元時所呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: The encoder passes two pieces of information to the fallback buffer implementation: the character or surrogate pair that could not be encoded and the index of the character in the input.
trans-unit.target: 編碼器會將兩項資訊傳遞給後援緩衝區實作： 的字元或無法編碼的 surrogate 字組與輸入中字元的索引。

trans-unit.source: In an encoder fallback exception handler, the exception is thrown in this method.
trans-unit.target: 編碼器後援例外狀況處理常式，在此方法中擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the method returns `true` if it provides a fallback, or `false` if it does not.
trans-unit.target: 否則，方法會傳回`true`提供後援，或`false`如果不存在。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A> method, which is called repeatedly by the encoder if the <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A>方法，會重複呼叫 encoder 如果<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A>方法會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: In successive calls, the handler should return each character in its buffer.
trans-unit.target: 在後續呼叫中，此處理常式應該會傳回在其緩衝區中的每個字元。

trans-unit.source: When it has returned all characters, it should return U+0000.
trans-unit.target: 當它傳回的所有字元時，則會傳回 U + 0000。

trans-unit.source: An exception handler always returns U+0000.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況處理常式會一律傳回 U + 0000。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.MovePrevious%2A> method, which tries to move the pointer to the previous position in the buffer and indicates whether the move was successful.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.MovePrevious%2A>方法，它會嘗試將指標移至緩衝區中的前一個位置，並指出移動是否成功。

trans-unit.source: An exception handler always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況處理常式會一律傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Remaining%2A> property, which indicates the number of remaining characters to be returned to the encoder.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Remaining%2A>屬性，指出要傳回至編碼器的剩餘字元數。

trans-unit.source: An exception fallback handler always returns zero.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況後援處理常式一律會傳回零。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a substitute string is available when the original input cannot be encoded, or whether the original input should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 指示在無法為原始輸入編碼時，是否可以使用替代字串，或者是否應該忽略原始輸入。

trans-unit.source: An input character.
trans-unit.target: 輸入字元。

trans-unit.source: The index position of the character in the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 輸入緩衝區中字元的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, prepares the fallback buffer to handle the specified input character.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，預備後援緩衝區來處理指定的輸入字元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the fallback buffer can process <paramref name="charUnknown" />; <see langword="false" /> if the fallback buffer ignores <paramref name="charUnknown" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果後援緩衝區可以處理 <paramref name="charUnknown" />，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果後援緩衝區會忽略 <paramref name="charUnknown" />，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods call <xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%29> if they encounter an unknown input character that cannot be encoded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法呼叫<xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%29>如果遇到未知的輸入的字元無法編碼。

trans-unit.source: A return value of `true` indicates that the fallback buffer can process the input character, which causes the calling method to call the <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A> method to obtain each character of the fallback buffer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值為`true`指出後援緩衝區可以處理輸入的字元，就會導致呼叫的方法呼叫<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A>方法，以取得每個後援緩衝區的字元。

trans-unit.source: Because it does not process individual characters, the <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> method in an exception fallback handler throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 因為它不會處理個別字元，<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A>例外狀況後援處理常式中的方法會擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The high surrogate of the input pair.
trans-unit.target: 輸入字組的高 Surrogate。

trans-unit.source: The low surrogate of the input pair.
trans-unit.target: 輸入字組的低 Surrogate。

trans-unit.source: The index position of the surrogate pair in the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 輸入緩衝區中 Surrogate 字組的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, prepares the fallback buffer to handle the specified surrogate pair.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，預備後援緩衝區來處理指定的 Surrogate 字組。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the fallback buffer can process <paramref name="charUnknownHigh" /> and <paramref name="charUnknownLow" />; <see langword="false" /> if the fallback buffer ignores the surrogate pair.
trans-unit.target: 如果後援緩衝區可以處理 <paramref name="charUnknownHigh" /> 和 <paramref name="charUnknownLow" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，如果後援緩衝區會忽略 Surrogate 字組則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods call <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%28System.Char%2CSystem.Char%2CSystem.Int32%29> if they encounter a surrogate pair in their input.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法呼叫<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%28System.Char%2CSystem.Char%2CSystem.Int32%29>如果遇到其輸入中的 surrogate 字組。

trans-unit.source: A return value of `true` indicates that the fallback buffer can process the surrogate pair, which causes the calling method to call the <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A> method to obtain each character of the fallback buffer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值為`true`指出後援緩衝區可以處理 surrogate 字組，這會呼叫的方法呼叫<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A>方法，以取得每個後援緩衝區的字元。

trans-unit.source: Because it does not process individual characters, the <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> method in an exception fallback handler throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 因為它不會處理個別字元，<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A>例外狀況後援處理常式中的方法會擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the next character in the fallback buffer.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，擷取後援緩衝區中的下一個字元。

trans-unit.source: The next character in the fallback buffer.
trans-unit.target: 後援緩衝區中的下一個字元。

trans-unit.source: An encoding operation calls the <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> method if the operation encounters an unknown character or surrogate pair in the input.
trans-unit.target: 編碼作業呼叫<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A>如果作業遇到未知的字元或 surrogate 字組，在輸入中的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the case of a replacement fallback, if the <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> method returns `true`, a substitute string exists that can be encoded instead of the unknown input.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果是取代後援，如果是<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A>方法會傳回`true`，替代字串存在，可以編碼而不是未知的輸入。

trans-unit.source: The encoding operation calls the <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A> method repeatedly and obtains the substitute string one character at a time.
trans-unit.target: 編碼作業呼叫<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A>方法重複，並取得一次的替代字串的一個字元。

trans-unit.source: When all characters in the fallback buffer have been returned to the encoder, the <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A> method should return U+0000.
trans-unit.target: 當編碼器後援緩衝區中的所有字元都傳回<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A>方法應傳回 U + 0000。

trans-unit.source: For an exception fallback handler, the <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A> method should return U+0000.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況後援處理常式，如<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar%2A>方法應傳回 U + 0000。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, causes the next call to the <see cref="M:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar" /> method to access the data buffer character position that is prior to the current character position.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會使 <see cref="M:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar" /> 方法的下一個呼叫存取在目前字元位置之前的資料緩衝區字元位置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.MovePrevious" /> operation was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="M:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.MovePrevious" /> 作業成功，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An exception fallback handler should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況後援處理常式應該傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the number of characters in the current <see cref="T:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer" /> object that remain to be processed.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，於目前的 <see cref="T:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer" /> 物件中取得仍要處理的字元數。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the current fallback buffer that have not yet been processed.
trans-unit.target: 目前的後援緩衝區中尚未處理的字元數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A> method returns `true` if <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Remaining%2A> is a nonzero value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Fallback%2A>方法會傳回`true`如果<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Remaining%2A>是非零值。

trans-unit.source: For an exception fallback handler, the <xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackBuffer.Remaining%2A> method should return zero.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況後援處理常式，如<xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackBuffer.Remaining%2A>方法應傳回零。

trans-unit.source: Initializes all data and state information pertaining to this fallback buffer.
trans-unit.target: 初始化與後援緩衝區有關的所有資料和狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: After calling the <see cref="M:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Reset" /> method, the <see cref="P:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Remaining" /> property should return 0, the <see cref="M:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar" /> method should return U+0000, and the <see cref="M:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.MovePrevious" /> method should return <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<see cref="M:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Reset" />方法，<see cref="P:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.Remaining" />屬性應該會傳回 0，<see cref="M:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar" />方法應傳回 U + 0000，而<see cref="M:System.Text.EncoderFallbackBuffer.MovePrevious" />方法應傳回<see langword="false" />。
